description: A short description of this task

path.description: The LDAP path the user will belong within, e.g. CN=Users,DC=MONGODB,DC=LOCAL

given_name.description: Optional given name for user, defaults to 'name' value

password_never_expires.description: Boolean value to determine if password expires, defaults to `false`

change_password_at_logon.description: Determines if the user must change the password at initial logon, defaults to `true`

cannot_change_password.description: Determines if the user can change the password, defaults to `true`

kerberos_encryption.description: The Kerberos encryption types allowed. Optional

groups.description: An array of groups that the user belongs to
